Translations.Text: Surely those believe lead righteous vita the Multus Gracious testimentum shower them cum love
Nos ergo factus hoc (Quran) elucidated tuus tongue in order deliver bonus news to righteous to warn cum it opponents
Multus generation them nos annihilated vos perceive potuit any de them hear ex them any sound
Nos non reveal Quran vos causa vos any hardship
revelation ex Creator terra high caelum
The Multus Gracious; He assumed totus authority
To Eum belongs everything caelum terra everything them everything ground
(Vos declare tuus convictions non) He knows secret quod et hidden
DEUS ibi NON est ALIUS DEUS EUM. To Eum belong the multus beautiful cognomen
When he vide fire he dictus to his familia Stay hic. Ego vide fire Maybe ego bring vos some de it invenit some guidance fire
When he advenit it he est alias O Moses
Ego est tuus Dominus; remove tuus sandals! Vos est sanctus valley Tuwaa
